forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning sun unfurls its golden arms over Downtown San Francisco, the city arises under a blanket of calm clarity, save for a whisper of cool breezes. The high temperature of 62 degrees promises a gentle warmth, letting temperatures drift to a comfortable 60 this afternoon. With a west-southwest wind brushing through at 12 to 20 mph, there’s a comforting nudge in the air, perfect for inviting those in search of a moment outdoors to pause and revel in the pleasantness of this summer day.

Although the forecast hints at a partly cloudy evening, today begins with the promise of sunshine, taking over the horizon and pushing back the fog usually clinging to the coastal charms of the Golden Gate. While some marine haze may linger, the vistas enjoy a surprising clarity for this time of year, presenting a magnificent canvas for afternoon explorations. A light jacket or layered outfit would offer comfort against the mild breeze, allowing wanderers to appreciate the charm of nearby parks or the bustling streets. For a simple pleasure, consider a stroll to a local café, engaging in the rhythm of the city—the gentle hum of conversations mingling with the distant laughter of children at play, reminding us that today is one not to be missed.
